ET.description: UDS is a standardized protocol and vulnerabilities are more well-known

SE.description: Knowledge of UDS vulnerabilities is required for this attack

KoIC.description: No sensitive internal knowledge about the vehicle is required

WoO.description: Access to the UDS diagnostic port is required

SubThreats.Description: An attacker abuses UDS to collect sensitive information about the vehicle system or data from the ECU

ET.description: Research from the attacker is required to find a relevant exploit

SE.description: Knowledge of vehicle and computational architecture is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the control systems is required

WoO.description: Flexible window of opportunity depending on the specific attack surface used

Eq.description: Typically, only a standard computer is required for this type of attack

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to gain access to personal information stored within the vehicles electronic systems

ET.description: Research time is required for this type of attack

SE.description: Knowledge of automotive and computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about internal control systems may be required

WoO.description: Flexible window of opportunity depending on the attack surface

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to gain access to telemetry data such as vehicle speed, acceleration, location, engine parameters, sensor readings, etc

SE.description: Knowledge of automotive and computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about internal controls is required

WoO.description: window of opportunity is flexible depending on the attack surface chosen

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to access any camera or audio system in a vehicle. Could be used to simply monitor their activity or to inject fraudulent information

ET.description: SMS is an established protocol with a variety of known exploits

SE.description: Knowledge about SMS protocols is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the specific controls used by the vehicle is required, but this information could be easily be found through trial and error by the attacker

WoO.description: Can be performed anytime the vehicle sends or receives a message

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to capture SMS messages sent or received by the vehicle

ET.description: Research is required for this type of attack

SE.description: Knowledge about computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about controls within the vehicle may be required

WoO.description: Physical access to the vehicle is required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required to extract the targeted data

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to harvest data stored within the vehicle through a connected local system

ET.description: Research is required for this type of attack

SE.description: Knowledge about automotive and computational systems are required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls may be required

WoO.description: Attack could occur whenever input is sent to the vehicle by the end-user

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to read the input data from the user to the vehicle

ET.description: Flexible depending on the attack surface used

SE.description: Knowledge about automotive and computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the controls within the vehicle may be required

WoO.description: Physical access to the vehicle may be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required for this attack

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to provide the location of the vehicle in real-time, or set intervals; to the attacker

ET.description: Most vehicles use standardized networking systems, which have known vulnerabilities

SE.description: Knowledge about networking systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the internal controls of the vehicle may be required

Eq.description: Typically, only a standard computer is required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to find and harvest sensitive data about the network within a vehicle

ET.description: Most networks follow standardized protocols with known exploits

SE.description: Knowledge about networking systems and their exploits is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicles controls will be required

Eq.description: Typically, only a standard computer is required

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to capture the traffic in a vehicles network, or redirect the endpoints of that traffic

ET.description: Research will be required to perform this attack

SE.description: Knowledge about computational systems is required

KoIC.description: Some knowledge about the vehicle's controls will be required

Eq.description: Some specialized equipment may be required depending on the attack surface that is utilized as the access point

SubThreats.Description: An attack designed to capture the output provided to the end-user for the sake of collecting sensitive data
